reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 251/96: RATING BY-LAWS-EXTENSION OF TIME
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 251/96: RATING BY-LAWS-EXTENSION OF TIME
reg_info.act_under: County of Oxford Act   Loi sur le comté d’Oxford

content.content: 1. For 1996, the time for the council of the County of Oxford to pass rating by-laws to raise the general regional levy under subsection 84.2 (2) of the Act and to raise a special levy for library purposes under subsection 84.2 (3) of the Act is extended to June 30, 1996. O. Reg. 251/96, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For 1996, the time for the council of the County of Oxford to pass rating by-laws to raise the general regional levy under subsection 84.2 (2) of the Act and to raise a special levy for library purposes under subsection 84.2 (3) of the Act is extended to June 30, 1996. O. Reg. 251/96, s. 1.
